item.title: About
item.description: PhD Candidate Mathematical Genomics, University of Cambridge & Wellcome Sanger Institute Research Assistant, Walter and Eliza Hall Institute MSc Probability and Statistics, University of Melbourne Optimisation Consultant, Biarri Commercial Mathematics BSc Applied Mathematics, University of Melbourne

item.title: Publications
item.description: Chaguza, Chrispin, Marie Yang, Jennifer E. Cornick, Mignon du Plessis, Rebecca A. Gladstone, Brenda A. Kwambana-Adams, Stephanie W. Lo, et al. 2020. "Bacterial Genome-Wide Association Study of Hyper-Virulent Pneumococcal Serotype 1 Identifies Genetic Variation Associated with Neurotropism." Communications Biology 3 (1): 559. Chou, Evelyn S., Sabia Z. Abidi, Marian Teye, Aleksandra Leliwa-Sytek, Thomas S. Rask, Simon A. Cobbold, Gerry Tonkin-Hill, et al. 2017. "A High Parasite Density Environment Induces Transcriptional Changes and Cell Death in Plasmodium Falciparum Blood Stages.

item.title: Software
item.description: fastBAPS A fast approximation to a Dirichlet Process Mixture model (DPM) for clustering genetic data pairSNP A set of scripts for very quickly obtaining pairwise SNP distance matrices from multiple sequence alignments using sparse matrix libraries to improve performance. Starmie R package developed with Stuart Lee to make post processing of population structure software output easier. rhierBAPS R package implementing the hierBAPS algorithm. Plasmodium falciparum transcriptome analysis scripts Scripts used in analysing differential expression in Plasmodium falciparum transcriptome data.
